title: Baconstr1pz was the Messiah.
body:
The Great Leader we were once promised yet too proud to accept him.

Your Glorious Destiny was ripped from you from Infamous Heretics known as Mods.

I hope to one day lay my eyes upon the Greatest of All Time.

http://i.imgur.com/6kS00cU.png


---

# Here lies Baconstr1pz.

#1337 - 2015
